summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on March 10, 2011. The email indicates a request for a conversation on a landline and emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication, suggesting it may contain privileged information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a desire to communicate with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is reaching out to Jes Staley for a conversation, indicating a level of familiarity and possibly a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on March 10, 2011.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Epstein requests a conversation with Staley on a landline, indicating it is not urgent.
